business.headline: IndusInd Bank shares crash 21% to hit 52-week low. Why is it falling today?IndusInd Bank stock price fall: IndusInd Bank's stock has lost nearly 50% in the past six months, with a 32% decline in the last four weeks alone. The stock fell nearly 4% to Rs 900.50 on the NSE in the previous session.

Sensex down nearly 400 points: Why is the stock market falling today? The Sensex fell nearly 400 points, while the Nifty dropped over 100 points as investors reacted to growing concerns about a possible recession in the US, along with a sharp fall in IT stocks.

Sensex, Nifty fall as US market crash rattles investors; IndusInd Bank down 10%The S&P BSE Sensex tanked 361.25 points to 73,753.92, while the NSE Nifty50 lost 113.65 points to 22,346.65 as of 9:16 AM.

Sensex, Nifty eye shaky opening as Wall Street crash spooks global marketsUS stock markets saw their biggest single-day fall since 2022 on Monday, March 10. The S&P 500 and Nasdaq crashed by up to 4%, while the Dow Jones dropped 2.08%.

IndusInd Bank shares in focus after Rs 1,577 crore networth hit riskThe stock fell nearly 4% to Rs 900.50 on the NSE in the previous session. IndusInd Bank's stock has lost more than 37% in the past six months, with a 16% decline in the last four weeks alone.

Tesla shares tumble almost 16% as US stock markets crashTesla shares plunged 15.4 per cent to USD 222.15 on Monday, their lowest since October, amid investor pessimism over slumping sales and Trump administration trade policy uncertainty. It was Tesla's steepest drop since September 2020.

Trump tariffs, recession fears slam US markets, wiping out $4 trillion in valueDonald Trump's tariffs have rattled investors, wiping out USD 4 trillion from the S&P 500 as trade uncertainty with Canada, Mexico, and China grows.

US stocks fall sharply as recession fears grow; Nasdaq down 4%US stocks fell sharply as concerns over tariffs and a potential government shutdown fuelled recession fears. The S&P 500 had its worst one-day drop since December, falling 2.7%, while the Nasdaq dropped 4%, confirming a correction.

Wall Street sell-off worsens on Trump tariffs, recession worriesEuropean markets have already taken a hit, and Asian markets are unlikely to be spared. Dalal Street is likely in for a rough session on Tuesday, especially information technology (IT) stocks that rely on the US for business.

US markets open lower day after Trump declines to rule out recessionIt's not just stocks struggling. Investors are sending prices lower for all kinds of investments whose momentum had earlier seemed nearly impossible to stop at times, such as bitcoin.

Bitcoin slips despite Trump's Strategic Bitcoin Reserve announcement. Here's whyBitcoin, the world's largest cryptocurrency, has dropped by 2.04% since the last day and is currently trading at $83,200.67, at the time of writing this article.

Tesla shares dip 45% in 3 months: What's behind the decline?Tesla's market value has fallen 45% since reaching a record high of $1.5 trillion on December 17, 2024. The stock surge followed Musk's financial backing of Donald Trump's election victory.

entertainment.headline: Singer Isabel LaRosa on performing at Lolla India: The experience was surrealIsabel LaRosa, known for hits like Favourite and I'm Yours, recently performed at Lollapalooza India. She discussed her music-making process and experience with India Today Digital.

Dhanashree Verma restores photos with Yuzvendra Chahal amid rumours of divorceDhanashree Verma restored Instagram photos with Yuzvendra Chahal amid divorce rumours. While her lawyer confirmed court proceedings, her family denied claims of a Rs 60 crore alimony demand.

Udit Narayan mocks the kiss row at 'Pintu Ki Pappi' eventVeteran playback singer Udit Narayan opened up about the viral kiss incident a month after backlash. He discussed the timeline of the video where he is seen kissing his female fans.

Ashish Chanchlani makes public appearance after India's Got Latent row. WatchContent creator Ashish Chanchlani made a rare public appearance in Mumbai amid controversy surrounding Ranveer Allahbadia's comment on India's Got Latent.

Watch: Hip Hop India 2 trailer promises to raise intensity, higher the stakesHip Hop India, the country's hip-hop dance reality show, is set to return for its second season on Amazon MX Player, promising even more thrilling performances and intense dance battles.

You 5 trailer: Penn Badgeley's Joe Goldberg returns for a killer finaleThe trailer for You Season 5 is out, showcasing the last chapter of Joe Goldberg's saga. Streaming starts April 24 on Netflix, with Joe facing past demons.
South Korean singer Wheesung found dead at 43Popular South Korean soloist Wheesung was found dead at his home on Monday. The authorities are still investigating the matter.

Meghan Markle's father criticises her show, mocks her for putting flowers on food Meghan Markle's estranged father, Thomas Markle, talked about her Netflix show, 'With Love, Meghan', in an interview. He called her 'fake', and mentioned that she should have had a more relatable show for women who are not privileged like her.

Surreal and magical: Singer Lisa Mishra on sharing stage with Ed SheeranSinger Lisa Mishra performed the opening act for British singer Ed Sheeran during his concert in India earlier this year. Speaking exclusively to India Today Digital, the 31-year-old reflected on her experience of the same. Additionally, she opened up about working with Ananya Panday in Call Me Bae.

While promoting his new clothing brand, he showcased his new look, prompting fans to compare him to fellow Punjabi singer and rapper AP Dhillon.

When Life Gives You Tangerines review:  IU, Park Bo-gum's series is a must-watchReleased-Fri Mar 07, 2025In When Life Gives You Tangerines, IU and Park Bo-gum deliver mesmerising performances in a story that spans decades. Set against the backdrop of 1960s Jeju, this K-drama explores themes of love, endurance, and the quiet strength of women.

Actor Helly Shah on TV's future: We need to up our gameActor Helly Shah talks about her comedy debut, TV's regressive content, and her Bollywood aspirations. She also shares that she dreams of playing bold and tough roles.

general news.headline: Elon Musk alleges Ukraine link in X cyberattack that caused global outageElon Musk's X suffered repeated outages Monday, which he blamed on a "massive cyberattack" from the "Ukraine area". However, a pro-Palestinian hacker group has claimed responsibility for the attack, raising questions about the true source of the disruption.

DMK MP's privilege motion against Union Minister over 'uncivilised Tamils' remarkDMK MP Kanimozhi has filed a privilege motion against Union Education Minister Dharmendra Pradhan, accusing him of misleading Parliament on Tamil Nadu's stance on the PM Shri scheme. She denied claims of a U-turn by the state government and MPs.

Kerala girl dies after water fasting: What extreme weight-loss diets do to the bodyAn 18-year-old girl from Kerala tragically died from anorexia after following extreme water fasting inspired by online portals. Experts warn against crash diets and prolonged fasting, citing severe health risks.

Trump's 'first of many' warning after Palestinian activist arrested at ColumbiaIn a long Truth Social post, US President Donald Trump warned that the arrest of 30-year-old Palestinian student-activist Mahmoud Khalil, who led the Columbia University protests, is the "first of many to come".

Speeding Porsche collides with two scooters in Chandigarh, 1 killedA speeding Porsche allegedly hit two scooters in Chandigarh's Sector 4, killing one man and injuring two women. The impact of the collision was such that the scooter rider's body was cut into two peices.

Political gossip: DK Shivakumar on reports linking ministers to gold smugglingAs the investigation into the gold smuggling case intensified, Karnataka Deputy Chief Minister DK Shivakumar dismissed reports linking ministers to the case involving Kannada actor Ranya Rao. He called them "political gossip" and added that it was being investigated by central agencies.

Sports Ministry revokes suspension of Wrestling Federation of India The Sports Ministry has revoked the suspension of the Wrestling Federation of India (WFI). Back in December 2023, the Ministry had suspended the WFI over taking hasty decision and showing disregard for the existing rules and regulations.

Jaipur school bans Holi colours, threatens exam ban if violated; minister fumesA school in Rajasthan's Jaipur has urged students not to bring colours to celebrate Holi within the premises, threatening that a violation of the order will bar them from examinations.

It's not just you, ChatGPT, too, has anxiety issuesAccording to a new study, Large Language Models (LLMs) like ChatGPT may not have feelings, but they can experience "anxiety" due to users' disturbing prompts.

Why Yogi Adityanath backs Sambhal cop in Holi-Friday namaz rowThe Uttar Pradesh CM, speaking at the India Today Conclave 2025, underlined the segregated Holi-Friday prayers plan for the district. On DSP Anuj Kumar Chaudhary, he said…

PM Modi in Mauritius for 2-day visit, gets warm welcome at airportPrime Minister Narendra Modi arrived in Mauritius for a two-day visit on Tuesday, and received a warm welcome by his counterpart Navin Ramgoolam at the airport in Port Louis.

Indiana boy dies after 340-pound foster mom sat on him for five minutesThe autopsy report revealed that Dakota died from mechanical asphyxia, and the manner of death was ruled a homicide.

'Free Palestine', 'Azad Kashmir' graffiti at Jadavpur University, case registeredA graffiti with slogans like 'Free Palestine' and 'Azad Kashmir' was painted on a wall at Kolkata's Jadavpur University. KKK 14's Aditi Sharma heads for divorce, husband alleges infidelity in 4 monthsTV actor Aditi Sharma's marital bliss was short-lived as her husband Abhineet Kaushik accused her of cheating. This comes just four months after their secret wedding on November 12, 2024.

Videos: Sivakarthikeyan greets fans at Parasakthi set in Sri LankaActor Sivakarthikeyan and the team of Parasakthi are in Sri Lanka for their new schedule. Fans have been visiting the film's set to get a glimpse of Sivakarthikeyan.

Rekha proves she is the fashion icon in all-white pantsuit, gold sneakersVeteran actor Rekha stunned in a boss-lady look, donning an all-white pantsuit at the trailer launch of the upcoming film Pintu Ki Pappi. The timeless fashion icon once again broke the internet, proving why she remains the ultimate style queen.

sports.headline: Some Manchester United players not 'good enough', some 'overpaid': Jim RatcliffeManchester United co-owner Jim Ratcliffe has delivered a damning verdict on the current squad, saying some of the players are not 'good enough'. Ratcliffe also gave his backing to current manager Ruben Amorim.

Watch: After Champions Trophy win, Ravindra Jadeja joins CSK in 'Pushpa' styleAfter helping India win the Champions Trophy, Ravindra Jadeja arrived at the Chennai Super Kings team base with some 'Pushpa' swag on Monday, March 10. Jadeja will be a key player for Chennai this season.

Haris Rauf blessed with baby boy before New Zealand T20IsPakistan speedster Haris Rauf became a father with wife Muzna Masood Malik. Rauf's teammates Shadab Khan and Shaheen Shah Afridi took to social media to congratulate the pacer.

Another injury blow to Mayank Yadav, pacer to miss 1st half of IPL: Report IPL 2025: LSG fast bowler Mayank Yadav is racing against time to recover from the back injury he sustained last year. The speedster could only play four games last year due to a side strain.

WPL: Mumbai Indians closing in on top spot with 9-run win over Gujarat GiantsMumbai Indians beat Gujarat Giants by nine runs in Match 19 of the Women's Premier League 2025 at Brabourne Stadium, Mumbai. Following their win, MI have a great chance of finishing at the top on points table and directly qualify for the final.

Watch: Rohit Sharma poses with his two ICC trophies in front of Burj KhalifaIndia captain Rohit Sharma posed with his two ICC trophies in front of Burj Khalifa following India's triumph in the ICC Champions Trophy 2025. India beat New Zealand by four wickets in the final.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
The generation with answers: Tech-savvy Indian youth tackling global challengesIndia's tech-savvy youth rewriting the global narrative, one solution at a time.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.
The power of knowledge: Education's influence on real estate market trendsIn a dynamic sector like real estate, investing in continuing education is not simply an option; it is a requirement.

JNU students' body election on March 22 after 4 yearsThe Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls will take place on March 22, more than four years after the last elections were held in September 2019.

UP 12th board exam math, biology papers leaked on WhatsApp, complaint filedThe mathematics and biology question papers for the Uttar Pradesh class 12 board exam were allegedly leaked on a WhatsApp group.

UP Police Constable recruitment exam cancelled days after paper leakThe Uttar Pradesh Police Constable recruitment exam held on February 17 and 18 was canceled due to a paper leak. The Chief Minister has announced a re-examination within the next six months.
